meanings.definition: A prescription medication used for weight loss.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed phentermine to help me lose weight.
meanings.sent2: Many people have successfully lost weight with phentermine.
meanings.sent3: I tried eating healthy and exercising, but then I turned to phentermine for some extra help.
meanings.sent4: Phentermine is like a little weight-loss warrior fighting against extra pounds.
meanings.sent5: The power of phentermine in shedding pounds is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To take phentermine as directed by a doctor.
meanings.sent1: Remember to phentermine exactly as your doctor tells you.
meanings.sent2: She always remembers to phentermine at the same time every day.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally phentermined twice yesterday, and now I feel dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Phentermine your way to a healthier you with discipline and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Phentermine diligently for the best weight loss results.

meanings.definition: The side effects of phentermine may include increased heart rate and insomnia.
meanings.sent1: Some people experience increased heart rate as a side effect of phentermine.
meanings.sent2: Insomnia is a common side effect of phentermine for many users.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would be grateful for phentermine-induced insomnia, but here we are.
meanings.sent4: The side effects of phentermine can make your heart race like a marathon runner.
meanings.sent5: The potential side effects of phentermine should not be taken lightly.
